name: Buffalo Tofu Wrap Recipe with Chickpea Tofu
description: Buffalo Tofu wrap with chickpea tofu. Soy-free Chickpea flour Tofu tossed in buffalo sauce with celery, spinach, cucumbers and vegan ranch. Easy weekday meal Recipe. Makes 3 or 4 wraps. Vegan Soy-free Recipe. Glutenfree with gf wraps or as a salad bowl.
recipeIngredient: 1.5 cups Chickpea Tofu (cubed or regular firm Tofu pressed and cubed)
2 tsp extra virgin olive oil or melted vegan butter
1  recipe celery ranch sauce or other vegan ranch or Follow Your heart ranch or creamy dressing of choice ((see notes))
Wheat or other tortillas (or pita bread)

recipeInstructions.name: Make the chickpea tofu in advance:

itemListElement.text: Prepare the chickpea tofu according to instructions.
itemListElement.name: Prepare the chickpea tofu according to instructions.

itemListElement.text: Mix the ingredients under buffalo sauce. Use 1.5 cups chickpea tofu cubed into small cubes. Toss in the sauce and let it sit for a few minutes while you prep the other ingredients.
itemListElement.name: Mix the ingredients under buffalo sauce. Use 1.5 cups chickpea tofu cubed into small cubes. Toss in the sauce and let it sit for a few minutes while you prep the other ingredients.

itemListElement.text: Blend up the ranch sauce. Mix chopped celery into some of the ranch. Chop or prep veggies.
itemListElement.name: Blend up the ranch sauce. Mix chopped celery into some of the ranch. Chop or prep veggies.

itemListElement.text: Warm the tortillas (optional). Arrange spinach or greens, and cucumbers. Add a dash of salt and pepper. Add a good helping of the buffalo chickpea tofu. Top with celery + ranch mix. Fold and serve with extra ranch on the side. Or make bowls out of the greens, buffalo tofu, celery, veggies and vegan ranch dressing.
itemListElement.name: Warm the tortillas (optional). Arrange spinach or greens, and cucumbers. Add a dash of salt and pepper. Add a good helping of the buffalo chickpea tofu. Top with celery + ranch mix. Fold and serve with extra ranch on the side. Or make bowls out of the greens, buffalo tofu, celery, veggies and vegan ranch dressing.
